name: Gems Of Spectrum
description:
This game is a demo currently, but is being worked on every day for updates.

Follow the install instructions for updates to keep your save data.

This game is about mining, and has a complex system for smithing bars, to weapons and equipping those weapons to use in the Adventure mode when you're exploring.

I am currently working on the bosses, so watch for a future update with bosses!

***Friendly reminder, don't forget to Equip your weapon after Smithing it before going into Explore in Adventure mode!
